duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high quality and convenient care to patients in McLaren Care Now retail health settings using a Telehealth format.
Lead the workflow in performing wellness exams and treating minor illnesses, from patient check-in to discharge, in collaboration with an Advanced Practice Provider (APP).
Open and close the clinic each day, maintaining daily operations of Point of Care (POC) testing systems.
Greet customers, assist in entering PHI into the Convenience stand, and escort patients to the Console area, identifying chief complaint and entering information into NextGen.
Perform vital signs and POC tests per policy, triage patients based on chief complaint, vital signs, and symptoms, and provide discharge instructions and follow-up care information to patients.
Promote McLaren Care Now clinics, answer customer questions and inquiries, answer phones, and provide responses to questions.

Follow up on test results, provide abnormal findings to APP attention, collect and process patient payments, assist patients in identifying a Primary Care Provider (PCP), and develop close working relations with Walgreen’s Pharmacy and staff.
Perform other related responsibilities as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of nursing with a current license to practice as a Registered Nurse in the State of Michigan. Minimum of two years of med/surg, critical care, or demonstrated experience in a specialty area.
Preferably, two years hospital experience in ICU or ER, as well as experience in a retail-based clinic.
